string$itemtype

Reference table
array$already_link_tables
Array of tables already joined

New table to join

Linkfield for LeftJoin
boolean$meta
Is it a meta item ? (default 0)

Array join parameters (condition / joinbefore...)

Field to display (needed for translation join) (default '')

TODO: should be a class property (output parameter)

constructCriteriaSQL() constructCriteriaSQLSearch SearchconstructCriteriaSQL
static constructCriteriaSQL ( $criteria = [] , $data = [] , $searchopt = [] , $is_having = false )[static]
Construct WHERE (or HAVING) part of the sql based on passed criteria
Depuis
9.4
Paramètres
array$criteria
list of search criterion, we should have these keys:
link (optionnal): AND, OR, NOT AND, NOT OR
field: id of the searchoption
searchtype: how to match value (contains, equals, etc)
value
array$data
common array used by search engine, contains all the search part (sql, criteria, params, itemtype etc) TODO: should be a property of the class
array$searchopt
Search options for the current itemtype
boolean$is_having
Do we construct sql WHERE or HAVING part
Renvoie
string the sql sub string
constructData() constructDataSearch SearchconstructData
static constructData (array & $data, $onlycount = false )[static]
Retrieve datas from DB : construct data array containing columns definitions and rows datas
add to data array a field data containing : cols : columns definition rows : rows data
Depuis
0.85
Paramètres
array$data
array of search data prepared to get data
boolean$onlycount
If we just want to count results
Renvoie
void|false May return false if the SQL data in $data is not valid

getMetaReferenceItemtype() getMetaReferenceItemtypeSearch SearchgetMetaReferenceItemtype
static getMetaReferenceItemtype ( $itemtype)[static]
Gets the class to use if the specified itemtype extends one of the known reference types.
Paramètres
class-string<CommonDBTM>
$itemtype
Renvoie
string|false The reference class name. If the provided itemtype is from a plugin, the provided itemtype is returned. If the itemtype is not from a plugin and not exactly or extended from a reference itemtype, false will be returned.
Depuis
0.85
